articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 turned into 'Windows Phone' — here's how - Windows Central
articles.description: Why have a Galaxy Z Fold 4 that looks like an Android device when it can look like Windows Phone?
articles.content:
• YouTuber Mark Spurrell turned his Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 into a Windows Phone for a recent video.
  • He completed the transformation by using two launchers running side-by-side.
